extensionDescription.message: Shorten links using your YOURLS server. Specify host and key and start shortening.

errorMissingSettings.message: Please configure your YOURLS settings first.

errorNetwork.message: Network error. Please check your connection.

errorCorsNetwork.message:
Error connecting to YOURLS server. Please check:
1. Your YOURLS server URL is correct
2. Your YOURLS server is online and accessible
3. Your signature token is correct

serverUrlHelp.message: Enter the URL to your YOURLS installation (e.g., https://your-yourls-domain.com/)

tokenHelp.message: Enter your YOURLS signature token for API access

connectionFailedGeneric.message:
Connection failed: Error connecting to YOURLS server. Please check:
1. URL is correct and includes http:// or https://
2. Your YOURLS server is online
3. Your signature token is correct

errorUrlRequired.message: Please enter your YOURLS server URL

errorTokenRequired.message: Please enter your YOURLS signature token

unexpectedFormat.message: Connection successful, but unexpected response format

additionalServerUrlHelp.message: Enter the URL to your additional YOURLS installation

additionalTokenHelp.message: Enter your additional YOURLS signature token for API access

additionalServerNameHelp.message: Enter a name to identify this server in the dropdown

errorAdditionalUrlRequired.message: Please enter your additional YOURLS server URL

errorAdditionalTokenRequired.message: Please enter your additional YOURLS signature token

errorAdditionalServerNameRequired.message: Please enter a name for your additional server

errorMissingAdditionalSettings.message: Please configure your additional YOURLS server settings first.

dashboardError.message: Unable to load dashboard data. Please check your server configuration.

additionalServerDescription.message: Configure a second YOURLS server for multiple shortening options

askKeywordHelp.message: When enabled, you'll be prompted for a custom keyword each time you shorten a URL

autoCopyHelp.message: When enabled, shortened URLs will automatically be copied to your clipboard

changelogDescription.message: Latest updates and improvements to the extension

autoSaveHelp.message: When enabled, settings will be saved automatically as you make changes

behaviorDescription.message: Configure how the extension behaves when shortening URLs

interfaceDescription.message: Customize the extension's appearance and language
